hero.description: Decode the matrix of global computer science education. Navigate a high-fidelity graph of curricula from the world's leading universities through a unified, high-performance interface.

mission.label: System Architecture
mission.desc_1: CodeCampus is not just a search engine; it is a decentralized academic intelligence unit. We ingest disparate catalog data to forge a normalized schema for global education comparison.
mission.desc_2: We architect order from chaos. By structuring fragmented syllabi, prerequisites, and learning outcomes into a queryable knowledge graph, we empower you to reverse-engineer your path to mastery.

universal_index.title: Universal Index
universal_index.desc: Access a normalized, query-optimized registry of courses from MIT, Stanford, Berkeley, and CMU via a single, latency-free control plane.

progress_analytics.title: Progress Telemetry
progress_analytics.desc: Track your intellectual velocity. Log coursework to generate real-time visualizations of your credit distribution and domain expertise.

gap_analysis.title: Skill Audit
gap_analysis.desc: Algorithmic comparison of your transcript against top-tier degree requirements. Detect prerequisite voids and optimize your learning vector.
